1261250.name: Cable Guardian Pro
1261250.description:
Please note that the visual features (overlays such as position markers) require SteamVR. I was unable to add them for Native Oculus because the Oculus API unfortunately does not make external overlays readily available for developers. :(

Cable Guardian Pro expands the standard version with the following features:

Overlays (OpenVR only ***)

  • Editable visual indicators
  • Editable floor markers with position and orientation alerts (for example room center)
  • On-demand status display
  • Field of view (FOV) measuring tool

Other

  • Automatic profile loading based on the game you start
  • Expandable user interface for vastly improved usability in SteamVR desktop mode
  • A much larger selection of included audio clips

*** Oculus users please note:

The overlay features are available only through the OpenVR API. --> SteamVR required ( = no native Oculus support). If a game is using the Oculus API, the visual indicators and floor markers will NOT be visible. This also applies to those games on Steam that have native Oculus support.



Get a free unlimited evaluation version by following the instructions below.
The suggested evaluation period is 30 days. Consider purchasing if you like the app. Thanks!

1/3. Install the free (non-pro) Cable Guardian.



2/3. Open Cable Guardian properties from the right click menu in your Steam library.



3/3. Go to "BETAS" tab and switch to beta branch "evaluation".
